mapper.sql: OPERATION_ID AS operationId, OPERATOR_ID AS operatorId, ENTRANT_ID AS entrantId, OPERATION_TIME AS operationTime
mapper.select: select * from t_entry_log where OPERATION_ID REGEXP CONCAT('^',#{time},'1[0-9]{3}$') and OPERATION_ID >= all( select OPERATION_ID from t_entry_log where OPERATION_ID REGEXP CONCAT('^',#{time},'1[0-9]{3}$') )

select a.OPERATION_ID,a.OPERATOR_ID,a.ENTRANT_ID,a.OPERATION_TIME from t_entry_log a left join t_staff b on a.OPERATOR_ID=b.STAFF_ID left join t_staff c on a.ENTRANT_ID = c.STAFF_ID
1 = 1
and a.OPERATION_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition1}),"%")
and( b.STAFF_NAME like concat(concat("%",#{condition2}),"%") or a.OPERATOR_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition2}),"%"))
and( c.STAFF_NAME like concat(concat("%",#{condition3}),"%") or a.ENTRANT_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition3}),"%"))

select a.OPERATION_ID,a.OPERATOR_ID,a.ENTRANT_ID,a.OPERATION_TIME from t_entry_log a left join t_staff b on a.OPERATOR_ID=b.STAFF_ID left join t_staff c on a.ENTRANT_ID = c.STAFF_ID
1 = 1
and a.OPERATION_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition1}),"%")
and( b.STAFF_NAME like concat(concat("%",#{condition2}),"%") or a.OPERATOR_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition2}),"%"))
and( c.STAFF_NAME like concat(concat("%",#{condition3}),"%") or a.ENTRANT_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition3}),"%"))
${ew.sqlSegment}

select a.OPERATION_ID,a.OPERATOR_ID,b.STAFF_NAME,a.ENTRANT_ID,c.STAFF_NAME, d.DEPARTMENT_NAME,e.POSITION_NAME, a.OPERATION_TIME from t_entry_log a,t_staff b,t_staff c,t_department d,t_position e
a.OPERATOR_ID = b.STAFF_ID and a.ENTRANT_ID = c.STAFF_ID and c.DEPARTMENT_ID = d.DEPARTMENT_ID and c.POSITION_ID = e.POSITION_ID
and a.OPERATION_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition1}),"%")
and( b.STAFF_NAME like concat(concat("%",#{condition2}),"%") or a.OPERATOR_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition2}),"%"))
and( c.STAFF_NAME like concat(concat("%",#{condition3}),"%") or a.ENTRANT_ID like concat(concat("%",#{condition3}),"%"))
